firstNightReminder: Show the token of a Minion in play. Mark that player with the Target token.
otherNightReminder: The Star Pierce points to a player. Nod yes or shake no to indicate if they are the target.
name: Star Pierce
ability: You start knowing an in-play Minion. Each night*, guess who it is: learn if you're right.
flavor: Attack. Reduce cooldown of all Attack cards by 2

jinxes.reason: If the Star Pierce learns that the Vizier is in play, the existence of the Vizier is not announced by the Storyteller.

firstNightReminder: Point to 3 players and mark Knows tokens on all of them.
otherNightReminder: If all players with Knows tokens are dead the Focus has no Learnt token, wake the Focus and point to 2 players, 1 of which is the Demon.
name: Focus
ability: You start knowing 3 players. The 1st time they are all dead: learn that the Demon is 1 of 2 players.
flavor: Gain 3 Focus status

firstNightReminder: Mark a player with the Learnt token then wake Jump Strike. Show them the character type of the marked player via the reminder tokens.
otherNightReminder: The previously marked player's clockwise neighbor, skipping Travellers, is marked instead. Wake Jump Strike and show them the character type of the marked player via the reminder tokens.
name: Jump Strike
ability: You start knowing a player's character type. Each night*, learn their next non-Traveller clockwise neighbor's character type. [+0 or +1 Outsider]
flavor: Attack twice. After the attack, if the card was placed in an odd-numbered position on the field, increase the Attack Power of this card by 1 & refuce cooldown by 4

firstNightReminder: The Dazzle points to a player, mark them with the Chosen token. If that player is evil, wake that player up after Dazzle's turn, show them 'This character has chosen you', Dazzles token and point to Dazzle then put them to sleep. They are drunk.
otherNightReminder: The player previously chosen by Dazzle is no longer drunk. The Dazzle points to a player, different to last night. If that player is evil: wake that player, show the Dazzle token and point to the Dazzle. The chosen player is drunk.
name: Dazzle
ability: Each night, choose a player (different to last night): chosen evil players learn you are Dazzle & are drunk until dusk.
flavor: For this Phase: Reduce Attack Power of opponent cards by 4

jinxes.reason: If the Summoner is drunk from Dazzle's ability on the 3rd night, the Summoner chooses which Demon but the Storyteller chooses which player.

firstNightReminder: The Fine Maneuver points to a player. If that player is evil: mark the Fine Manuever with the True token. All Townsfolk are sober, healthy and their abilities must yield true information until dusk.
otherNightReminder: The Fine Maneuver points to a player, different to last night. If that player is evil: mark the Fine Manuever with the True token. All Townsfolk are sober, healthy and their abilities must yield true information until dusk.
name: Fine Maneuver
ability: Each night, choose a player (different to last night): if evil, all Townsfolk are sober, healthy & their abilities yield true info until dusk.
flavor: If the next card on the field is an Attack, heal by 6 HP. If its a Magic card, inflict 6 damage

jinxes.reason: A drunk or poisoned Alchemist learns their ability after the Fine Maneuver's turn. The effects of a drunk or poisoned Alchemist's ability only takes place after Fine Maneuver's turn unless it would poison Fine Manuever.
If a drunk or poisoned Engineer uses their ability and the Fine Manuever chose an evil player the same night, the Engineer's ability will work.

The Overdrive learns info after the Fine Manuever's turn. If the Overdrive would make a Townsfolk drunk, that player is drunk after the Fine Manuever's turn if the Fine Manuever is in-play and the Overdrive is drunk or poisoned.

If the Fine Maneuver chooses an evil player the same night a drunk or poisoned Philospher uses their ability, they gain their chosen ability and will successfully drunk their chosen character once Fine Maneuever's ability wears off.

Minion and Demon info is delayed until after the Fine Manuever's turn if it is in-play and the Poppy Grower started out drunk or poisoned. If the Poppy Grower became sober and healthy from the Fine Manuever's ability it is skipped.
If a drunk or poisoned Preacher chooses a Minion the same night the Fine Manuever chooses an evil player, the Minion loses their ability and learns the Preacher chose them.

otherNightReminder: The Ammo Blast points to a player. If they are Minion, kill the Ammo Blast and as many of the players they previously chose as you like. If good, mark them with the Linked Token.
name: Ammo Blast
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if a Minion is chosen, you die & previously chosen players might die.
flavor: Attack twice by damage of 3 + number of remaining Arcana. Reduce Arcana to 0

otherNightReminder: The Encore points to a dead player. They gain their ability tonight and tomorrow. If they chose an evil, they are drunk.
name: Encore
ability: Each night*, choose a dead player: gain their ability (if unused) until dusk. If evil is chosen, you are drunk until dusk.
flavor: If previous card on the field is card user's, activate it again

jinxes.reason: If the Encore gains the Butler ability, the Encore learns this.
If the Juggler guesses on their first day and dies before learning, tonight a living Encore choosing the Juggler learns how many guesses the Juggler got correct.

If the Poppy Grower died today or before Encore's turn in the night order, evil info only occurs after Encore's turn unless they choose the Poppy Grower. Poppy Grower will be considered newly dead when Encore loses their ability at dusk.
If the Encore gains the Zealot ability, the Encore learns this.

otherNightReminder: The Fortify points to a player. They cannot die tonight, mark them with the Safe token. If they chose evil, Fortify is drunk, mark them with the Drunk token.
name: Fortify
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they can't die tonight. If you chose an evil player, you are drunk.
flavor: Gain 12 Barrier

jinxes.reason: If the Leviathan is in play, players protected by Fortify are safe from all evil abilities.
If Riot is in play, players protected by Fortify are safe from all evil abilities.

otherNightReminder: Blitz chooses 2 players and a character. If that character is amongst the 2, tell them the other character. If not, show them any other token.
name: Blitz
ability: Each night, choose 2 players (not yourself & different from last night) & a character: if it is among them, learn the other character else learn false info.
flavor: Attack twice if used in odd-numbered Phase

otherNightReminder: Change and run the Mystery Attack's ability.
name: Mystery Attack
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn what your ability is tonight & tomorrow.
flavor: At the start of battle: Transform into a random Attack card. Turn back after battle

jinxes.reason: The Mystery Attack when learning their next ability will always recieve true information.

firstNightReminder: During the evil info steps, show Minions and Demons Shadow Pierce's token.
otherNightReminder: Wake the 1st Shadow Pierce. They choose a player, if their choice was the other Shadow Pierce, mark them with the Correct token. Wake the 2nd Shadow Pierce, they point to a player. If their choice was the other Shadow Pierce, mark them with the Correct Token. If both Shadow Pierces have Correct tokens, announce the game has ended and good has won.
name: Shadow Pierce
ability: Each night*, if both Shadow Pierces guessed the other, good wins. Evil knows Shadow Pierce is in-play & win if they publicly guess 1. [+1 Shadow Pierce]
flavor: Attack & if there's another card user's card on the field, transform it to Shadow Pierce

jinxes.reason: A Shadow Pierce cannot turn evil due to the Bounty Hunter's ability.
The Marionette does not learn that the Shadow Pierces are in play.
A Shadow Pierce cannot turn evil due to the Mezepheles' ability.
If a Pit Hag attempts to create a Shadow Pierce & there are spare tokens, the Storyteller chooses good players equal to spare tokens to become Shadow Pierce.
The Spy may choose to not see the Grimoire. If they do see the Grimoire, evil does not win from correctly guessing a Shadow Pierce.

On the Widow's first night, they may choose to not see the Grimoire. Instead all in-play good character tokens are shown to them. They point to one of those or themselves to poison. If they chose to see the Grimoire, evil does not win from correctly guessing a Shadow Pierce. The Widow cannot choose a Shadow Pierce to poison.

firstNightReminder: The Overdrive shakes head "no" or points to a player. If they pointed: mark them with the "No Ability" token and show them that players character token. If that player is a Townsfolk, mark them with the Drunk token.
otherNightReminder: If the Overdrive still has their ability: the Overdrive shakes head no or points to a player. Show them that players character token. If that player is a Townsfolk, they are drunk, mark them with the Drunk token.
name: Overdrive
ability: Once per game at night, choose a player: learn their character but they are drunk if a Townsfolk, even if you are dead.
flavor: No enemy cards on the field next Phase. Change HP to the number of cards on cooldown x 2

name: Hope
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any question & recieve some answers (only 1 is correct).
flavor: Recover HP by 8 and gain 4 Barrier

firstNightReminder: The first time an evil player chooses Inverse Strike, this ability will affect an evil player instead of Inverse Strike, mark Inverse Strike with the No Ability token.
otherNightReminder: The first time an evil player chooses Inverse Strike, this ability will affect an evil player instead of Inverse Strike, mark Inverse Strike with the No Ability token.
name: Inverse Strike
ability: The 1st time an evil player chooses you with their ability at night, an evil player is chosen instead.
flavor: Attack then reduce cooldown of Magic cards

firstNightReminder: Dont tell the Demon their Minions and Minions their Demon and instead show both parties Tricks Mask's token. Minions then choose a player. If the Demon or Trick Mask, nod "yes" otherwise shake head "no".
otherNightReminder: Minions choose a player. If the Demon or Trick Mask, nod "yes" otherwise shake head "no".
name: Trick Mask
ability: Minions & Demons do not know the other. Each night, Minions guess a player: if you or a Demon, they learn this, even if your ability is removed from play.
flavor: Halve opponent Barrier and gain 4 Cover Status

jinxes.reason: If both Trick Mask and Legion are in-play, Legion do not learn each other and, each night, may guess a player as Legion. They learn if they are correct. Trick Mask registers as Legion to this jinx.
If the Trick Mask's ability is active, Minions also wake each night to choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token. Non-Minions dont learn they are babysitting Lil' Monsta if it is not alive.
The Magician registers as the Demon to Trick Mask's ability instead of Trick Mask.
The Demon will still learn who the Marionette is.
When the Summoner uses their ability, the Summoner chooses which Demon but the Storyteller chooses which player.
If the Trick Mask's ability is active: Spy does not see the Grimoire.
The Widow does not see the Grimoire. Instead all in-play good character tokens are shown to them. They point to one of those or themselves to poison.
The Trick Mask's ability is not affected by the Vortox.

firstNightReminder: Point out up to 2 alive players as you want to the Whisper. Those players are linked to them.
name: Whisper
ability: You start knowing up to 2 alive players: what happens to you happens to them, and vice versa, even if poisoned or drunk.
flavor: Inflict 3 Sensitive

otherNightReminder: If Stress is dead: choose if a Minion's ability will work twice. If so, wake that Minion, show them "This character has chosen you" and Stress' character token. Mark them with the Works Twice token. Their ability works twice now. Wake Stress, signal them a thumbsup to indicate their ability is in effect.
name: Stress
ability: Each night, if you are dead, a Minion's ability might work twice until dusk. You & they learn this.
flavor: Does nothing. Disappears when used or after battle

jinxes.reason: A Stress boosted Mezepheles cannot create 2 evil players.
If the Summoner's ability works twice due to Stress, the second Demon they create retains their alignment. If the Summoner creates 2 evil Demons, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

firstNightReminder: Point to a player and put the Target token on them.  If this player is a Minion, choose to show them the Minion token then put it on their character.
otherNightReminder: If the Feint wasnt mad, choose whether to kill the involved players. Point to a player and put the Target token on them. If the Feint has no Minion token and that player is a Minion, choose to show them the Minion token and put it on their character.
name: Feint
ability: Each night, learn a player. If you aren't mad they are evil tomorrow, one or both of you might die. If you learn a Minion, you might learn this (once).
flavor: Gain 3 Feint Status

otherNightReminder: At the earliest oppurtunity after the Coda's death, wake the Demon. Show them "This character has chosen you" then Coda's token and then the character token of the Minion whose ability they have. The Demon now has that ability and you run it like a normal Minion ability.
name: Coda
ability: When you die, the Demon gains a Minion ability alongside their own.
flavor: Reduce opponent HP by 5. Reset cooldown of other cards on the field if opponent was defeated by this card

jinxes.reason: If the Demon gains the Baron's ability, up to 2 players become not-in-play Outsiders.
If the Coda is executed and the Demon would gain the Boomdandy's ability, it instead triggers immediately.
If the Coda dies and would give the False Idol's ability, a Minion gains it instead and learns so.
Up to 3 extra players learn that the Grave is in play. If the Grave's ability is created midgame, those are its targets. If no possible targets, the Grave's ability cannot be put into play.
Up to 3 extra players learn that Hunter is in play. If Hunter's ability is created midgame, those are its targets. If no possible targets, Hunter's ability cannot be put into play.

If the Demon has a neighbor who is alive and a good Townsfolk or Outsider when the Coda dies and would give the Marionette ability, that player becomes an evil Marionette. The Coda cannot give the Marionette ability if there is already an extra evil player.
If the Coda dies and would give the Scarlet Woman's ability, a Minion gains it instead and learns so.
If the Demon gains and uses the Summoner's ability, deaths tonight are arbitrary. The Summoner's ability cannot create an in-play Demon.

otherNightReminder: If a Trauma just died, wake them and show them "You are" then Trauma's character token. If their character on the Grimoire is not Trauma, take a spare Trauma token and replace their character with it. Mark a Townsfolk with Is Trauma token. They are Trauma now.
name: Trauma
ability: When you die, learn your character then a Townsfolk becomes a Trauma, thinks they are a Townsfolk & learns false info.
flavor: Take 4 damage. Disappears from deck when used in Battle. Cannot be lost or dissolved

jinxes.reason: If the Vortox's ability is active and Townsfolk was turned into a Trauma by Trauma's ability, that player exclusively learns true info instead.

otherNightReminder: If the Showtime died today or tonight, wake them to choose a player. Mark them with the Target token.
name: Showtime
ability: If you died today or tonight, choose 1 alive player: if they are not executed tomorrow, your team loses. If it is the final day, you are drunk.
flavor: Gain 2 Automana status & reduce cooldown of Attack cards by 2

firstNightReminder: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play
name: Biter
ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. Dead Outsiders poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 or +1 Outsider]
flavor: Chomp Chomp

jinxes.reason: The Heretic starts knowing an out-of-play Outsider & registers as that Outsider to Biter.

firstNightReminder: Show the Grave up to 3 play character tokens then put the Target reminders on the corresponding players. Wake them up seperately, show them Grave's token then put them to sleep.
otherNightReminder: The Grave points to as many players as targets. If correct, announce that their team has won.
name: Grave
ability: You start knowing up to 3 in-play good characters (they learn this). Each night*, if you guess the players & at least 1 is alive, your team wins.
flavor: you shall not pass

jinxes.reason: The Grave cannot have a Dazzle as their target
The Grave cannot have a Exorcist as their target
The Grave cannot have a Heretic as their target.
The Grave cannot have a King as their target
The Grave cannot have a Lunatic as their target
Up to 3 extra players learn that the Grave is in play. If the Grave's ability is created midgame, those are its targets. If no possible targets, the Grave's ability cannot be put into play.

firstNightReminder: Show the Hunter an up to 3 play character tokens then put the Target reminders on the corresponding players. Wake them up, show them Hunter's character token and put them to sleep.
otherNightReminder: The Hunter points to a player, if they have a Target token, they die.
name: Hunter
ability: You start knowing up to 3 in-play good characters (they learn this). Each night* choose a player, if they are a target, they die.
flavor: if you're not willing to obey, then only the end awaits you

jinxes.reason: The Hunter cannot have a Dazzle as their target
The Hunter cannot have a Exorcist as their target
The Hunter cannot have a Heretic as their target.
The Hunter cannot have a King as their target
The Hunter cannot have a Lunatic as their target
Up to 3 extra players learn that the Hunter is in play. If the Hunter's ability is created midgame, those are its targets. If no possible targets, the Hunter's ability cannot be put into play.

firstNightReminder: The Hagumoth points to a player. Wake that player, show them "This character has chosen you" and then Hagumoth's character token then put them to sleep. Mark them with the Chosen token. Tomorrow, if they are executed, their team loses.
otherNightReminder: The Hagumoth points to a player. Wake that player, show them "This character has chosen you" and then Hagumoth's character token then put them to sleep. Mark them with the Chosen token. Tomorrow, if they are executed, their team loses.
name: Hagumoth
ability: Each night, choose a player: they learn this & if they are executed tomorrow, their team loses.
flavor: Verily, thou art screwed.

jinxes.reason: If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Hagumoth ability in addition to their own and learns this.
The Vizier wakes with the Hagumoth, learns who they choose and cannot choose to immediately execute that player tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: The Tyrant points to a player. That player dies. If the Demon is marked with the Overthrown token, they do not wake tonight. If they do not, wake them as normal and then mark them with the Overthrown token.
name: Tyrant
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The Demon wakes every other night, even if you are dead, drunk or poisoned.
flavor: We shall dance, challenger

jinxes.reason: The Tyrant registers as the Demon to the Banshee's ability.
The Lil' Monsta's ability does not kill every other day/night cycle.
If the Tyrant kills the Sage, the Sage learns the Demon is 1 of 2 players.
The Yaggababble's ability does not kill every other day/night cycle.
If the Tyrant is in play, the Zombuul instead wakes every other night that no player died that day.

firstNightReminder: Place both Has Ability tokens on Enra. The Enra shakes head "no" or points to a player. Wake that player up, show them "This character has chosen you" and then Enra's character token and put them to sleep. They have no ability, mark them with No Ability. Then remove a Has Ability token from the Enra.
otherNightReminder: If the Enra has their ability: the Enra shakes head "no" or points to a player. Wake that player up, show them "This character has chosen you" and then Enra's character token and put them to sleep. They have no ability, mark them with No Ability. Then remove a Has Ability token from the Enra.
name: Enra
ability: Twice per game at night, choose a player: they learn this & have no ability. If you have no ability, chosen players might regain theirs at any time.
flavor: ... And it shall be our duty to slay the children of the wretched witch as our only way to reply to her sins

firstNightReminder: Place both Has Ability tokens on the Corrupted.
otherNightReminder: Every night but the first, if the Corrupted has its ability: the Corrupted shakes head "no" or points to 2 players. Mark the first player with the Choice 1 token and the second with the Choice 2 token. Remove a Has Ability token from Corrupted. Announce "The Corrupted has chosen" the first player's name "and" the second player's name. "After a countdown from 10, if most players have their hand up, the first player dies and if most players have their hand down, the second player dies. The Corrupted breaks ties." Start the countdown. When the countdown reaches 0, tally the results silently. The player with the most votes dies and the other is now alive.
name: Corrupted
ability: Twice per game, at night*, choose 2 players (all learn which): after a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most votes dies & the other lives, you break ties.
flavor: Do not worry, your death will be swift and painless

otherNightReminder: If the False Idol just became "The Demon", wake them and signal the day before evil wins. If the False Idol already knows: move the Stage token 1 step clockwise. If it reaches False Idol, remove a New Cycle and if there are none, evil wins.
name: False Idol
ability: If the Demon died today (ending the game), become "the Demon" and nobody can win. After 4 days, evil wins.
flavor: LISTEN TO ME, WATCH ME, LOVE ME!

jinxes.reason: If the Lleech's host dies during the day and the False Idol's ability triggers, the Lleech lives but loses their ability and registers as a Minion.
If both Mastermind's and False Idol's abilities trigger,False Idol's ability works as normal but if an evil player is executed during those 4 days, good wins.
If the Scarlet Woman's ability triggers, False Idol's does not.

firstNightReminder: The Madeline's clockwise Townsfolk neighbor is poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The Madeline's next clockwise Townsfolk neighbor is poisoned. Wake them later when Demons normally wake to point to a player. That player dies.
name: Madeline
ability: Each night, the next Townsfolk closer clockwise to you is poisoned until 3 are. Each night*, choose a player: they die.
flavor: If only you knew your place! But its too late now!

firstNightReminder: At start of game, assign a range of numbers and abilities to each of them then announce everyone what abilities you chose in any order without the numbers. Later, when you deem it appropriate, wake the Hand of Fate, they first signal a number. Note down the Hand of Fate's number and show them the unlocked ability. They may then signal the number of the ability they wish to use.
otherNightReminder: The Hand of Fate signals a number. Note it down and show them the unlocked ability. The Hand of Fate may then signal the number of the ability they wish to use. After they are done: they shake their head "no" then point to a player. That player dies.
name: Hand of Fate
ability: Each night, choose a number: gain that ability. Each night*, choose a player: they die. All players start knowing your abilities.
flavor: the time has come for you to return where you belong

firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions and show them the Invitation Letter's token. They will point to a player. If they do not come to a decision, choose a player. Wake that player, give them the Invitation Letter's token and mark them with the Invitee token. Place the Day 1 Token in the center of the Grimoire.
otherNightReminder: Place the next Day token in the centre of the Grimoire. Wake all Minions. They will point to a player. Wake that player, give them the Invitation Letter's token and mark them with the Invitee token. If it is Day 3, wake them. They choose a Demon. If they choose Invitation Letter motion them to choose again. When they make their choice, show them the "Your character is" card and the Demon they chose. Change their token in the Grimoire to reflect that and remove the Invitation Letter reminders and tokens. You may need to rotate their token if they are good.
name: Invitation Letter
ability: Each night, Minions choose who holds the Invitation Letter's token. On night 3, the invitee chooses a Demon to become. [+1 Minion]
flavor:
Greetings to whomever recieves this letter. 

You have been invited to be the VIP guest of the Great Party at Midnight being held on the 3rd night of the Black Moon! 
All costs will be covered by our generous Host*. Entertainment includes: singing, dancing, darts, music, talking, murdering the guests (only after the clock strikes 3), betrayal. Please bring your own Demon horns and ornamental mask. 



*Costs covered do not include travel fees, legal fees, hospital fees, bail. By attending this party you hereby acknowledge that The Followers of the One Beyond will not be held liable for any injuries, diseases, murder, arson, loss of sanity, loss of kidneys, and that you, the holder of the letter, consent to having your insides violently ripped out and replaced by the unholy offspring of our Lord.

jinxes.reason: If the Invitation Letter is in-play, the Clockmaker does not recieve their info until a Demon is successfully invited.
If the Cult is invited, most players (including all evil players) become evil Cultists. If the Cult wins and they were invited, they must do the macarena.

If the Engineer removes the Invitation Letter from play, the Invitee becomes the chosen Demon. If the Engineer creates the Invitation Letter before or on Night 4, the Demon becomes a not-in-play Minion Invitee. Otherwise nothing happens.
If Invitation letter is in-play and no Demon was invited yet, a Focus that met their requirements at their time to wake recieves their info after a Demon is invited.
If the Hatter dies, the Invitee can choose a Demon to become. If the Demon chooses Invitation Letter, they also choose a Minion to become and are the Invitee.
If Legion is invited, most players (including all evil players) become evil Legion.
If Lord of Typhon is invited, one of the Invitee's neighbors becomes an evil Lord of Typhon.
Each night, the Magician chooses a Minion: if that Minion & the Invitation Letter are alive, that Minion is the Invitee.
The Marionette neighbors a Minion, not the Demon. The Marionette is not woken to choose who takes the Invitation Letter's token, and does not learn they are the Marionette if they are the Invitee.
If the Poppy Grower is in play, Minions don't wake together. They are woken one by one, until one of them chooses to be the Invitee.
The Invitee may choose to invite Pukka on Night 2.
If there are 5 or more players alive (excluding Travellers) and the Invitee dies, the Scarlet Woman is the Invitee then loses their ability.
If the Trick Mask's and Invitation Letter's ability is active, Minions do not learn each other and are instead woken one by one until one of them chooses to take the Invitation Letter's token.
The Vizier can die by execution if they are the Invitee.
On night 3, if a dead player becomes the Invitee, they may choose to invite Zombuul. If they do, they become a Zombuul that has died once.

otherNightReminder: The Plank of Wood points to a player. That player dies.
name: Plank of Wood
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On the final day, whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins.
flavor: *Plank of Wood noises*

otherNightReminder: The Estelle shakes their head "no" or points to as many players as their +1 tokens and 1 more. If Estelle pointed: those players die. If the Estelle shook their head "no": mark them with a +1 token unless they already have 4.
name: Estelle
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. For every night you chose no-one, you may choose 1 more (up to 4).
flavor: No... Please stop. I don't want to hurt you

firstNightReminder: Write down a list of events and have Time - Sixth make their choice. Announce it to everyone as well as when it will happen and keep a note of it. Place the Final Hour an equivalent steps to the right of Time - Sixth as the day of the event - 1 and as many New Days on Time - Sixth as Final Hour reaches Time - Sixth prematurely.
otherNightReminder: Time - Sixth points to a player. That player dies. Move the Final Hour 1 step clockwise. If it reaches Time - Sixth, remove a New Day. If there are none run the event.
name: Time - Sixth
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On your 1st night, choose from a list of events. All players learn your choice.
flavor: I gave your kind a chance. But it turned out to be a waste of time.

otherNightReminder: Signal (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) how many players the Corr. Sylphy can point to. They point to that many players. Those players die and place a Kill Chain token on Corr. Sylphy unless they already have 4.
name: Corr. Sylphy
ability: Each night*, choose 1 more player than the previous night (up to 5): they die. If an evil player died to execution today, choose 1.
flavor: Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor...

otherNightReminder: The Zhobazhbu points to a player. That player dies. If that player was a Minion, mark them with the Has Ability token and the Purged token. Townsfolk abilities yield false information while the Purged token is placed. At the start of the next night, remove the Purged token.
name: Zhobazhbu
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & Townsfolk abilities yield false info until dusk. [-1 Outsider]
flavor: By the Blessed Flame of the One Beyond, you are reborn.

jinxes.reason: If the Demon kills the Banshee, their announcement still happens as normal.

firstNightReminder: Wake Destiny if you need or want.
otherNightReminder: Destiny points to a player. That player dies. They may signal or text you their prediction.
name: Destiny
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You may make a prediction: if accepted, you cannot make another & it will come true with consequences.
flavor: The world is MINE to shape.

otherNightReminder: The Sabnock points to a player. That player dies. If they were an Outsider, their Townsfolk neighbor closer to Sabnock is poisoned, mark them with a Poisoned token.
name: Sabnock
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Outsiders you kill poison their Townsfolk neighbor closest to you. If equidistant, it is arbitrary. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Attrape des vers, salope.

firstNightReminder: You may choose to not wake a Demon.
otherNightReminder: You may choose to not wake a Demon.
name: Marusok
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Demons might not wake & are safe from the Demon, even if you are dead. [All Minions are Demons, Demons only learn bluffs]
flavor: I am the infinite spiral. What are you?

jinxes.reason: Corr. Sylphy's ability only checks the last night they woke.
Demons may choose to not attack when they wake. For every night a Demon chose to not attack, Estelle can choose 1 more player to kill.

If the Kazali is in-play, they may choose Marusok for their first choice. If they did so, the rest of their choices (if any) must be Demons. The Storyteller chooses which players become Marusok and the other Demons.
Maruok might replace a Legion. Other Demons might replace some Legion if Marusok is in-play.
Demons may choose to not attack when they wake. If the Po wakes and the last Demon to wake chose to not attack, they choose 3 players.
On day 3, all Demons become Riot.
Demons are not safe from the Vigormortis. If a Demon (not the Vigormortis) is killed by the Vigormortis, they keep their ability.

firstNightReminder: Mark the Time - Ninth with the Day 1 token.
otherNightReminder: If the Time - Ninth is marked with the Day 3 token: kill Townsfolk equitable to dead Minions. If the Time - Ninth's ability would end the game, you choose who dies. The Time - Ninth points to a player. That player dies.
name: Time - Ninth
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. After day 3, Townsfolk proportional to dead Minions die. If your ability would end the game: deaths tonight are arbitrary.
flavor: You cannot stop time. All you can do is run away from this reality. How far will you run away this time I wonder?

firstNightReminder: Choose the day evil will win. Announce it to everyone. Place the Break Point that many steps to the right of Fall. Charlotte - 1 and Place as many New Cycles on Fall. Charlotte as Break Point reaches Fall. Charlotte prematurely.
otherNightReminder: Move the Break Point one step clockwise. If it reaches Fall. Charlotte, remove a New Cycle. If there are none, evil wins.
name: Fall. Charlotte
ability: All players start knowing a day. After that day, at dusk, evil wins. For every failed nomination, that day comes closer by 1 (2 if Demon nominee).

jinxes.reason: Each night*, the Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Banshee dies & gains their ability.
If the Exorcist chooses the Fall. Charlotte, tomorrow failed nominations do not bring the final day closer.
Each night*, the Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Farmer uses their ability but does not die.
If the Fall. Charlotte is in play, players protected by Fortify are safe from all evil abilities.
If the Fall. Charlotte is in play and the Grandchild is a failed nominee, the final day comes closer by 2.
If the Fall. Charlotte is in play, the Innkeeper-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.
If the Fall. Charlotte is in play, and at least 1 player is dead, the King learns an alive character each night.
If the Fall. Charlotte and Mayor are both in-play and no execution occurs on the final day, good wins instead.
If the Fall. Charlotte is in play, the Monk-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.
Each night*, the Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Ravenkeeper uses their ability but does not die.
Each night*, the Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Sage uses their ability but does not die.
If the Fall. Charlotte is in play, the Soldier is safe from all evil abilities.

otherNightReminder: Players might die at any time
name: Cultist
ability: Players might die at any time. Evil votes secretly don't count & a 50% majority is not required. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Cultists]. [Most players are Cultists]
flavor: For centuries we have been watching and waiting for a sign, embedding ourselves in the most prestigious of positions and the lowest trenches of society. Now we have been blessed with the Revelation from the One Beyond. Have you not woken?

jinxes.reason: Cultists and the Engineer can not both be in play at the start of the game. If the Engineer creates a Culist, most players (including all evil players) become evil Cultists.
If the Hatter dies and a Cultist is in play, nothing happens. If the Hatter dies and an evil player chooses Cultist, all current evil players become Cultists.
If a Cultist died by execution today, Cultists keeps their ability, but the Minstrel might learn they are a Cultist.
If the Preacher chooses a Cultist, They keep their ability, but the Preacher might learn they are a Cultist.
If the Summoner creates a Cultist, most players (including all evil players) become evil Cultists.
If both Trick Mask and Cultists are in-play, Cultists do not learn each other and may guess a player is a Cultist. Trick Mask registers as a Cultist to this.
